name: Lonker
description:
King Arthur has been captured and Lonker his son has to go after him, but what Lonker doesn't know is that there are many mysteries behind it all, and he will have to overcome all difficulties.

this is my first "long" game I'm having a lot of difficulty but I'm sure I'll overcome them!

this version is a test for feedbacks, it is not the full version, there is still much more.
